explanation: [0-0] A tire is placed on the grass with a nail stuck in its tread.

[0-5] Then, a right hand holding a pair of pliers reaches in from the right side of the frame. The hand uses the pliers to grip the nail stuck in the tire and pulls it out forcefully. Afterward, the right hand picks up a threaded object and inserts it into the nail hole. Next, the right hand takes a black object and squeezes blue glue onto the threaded object. Finally, both hands repeatedly pull on the threaded object.

[5-10] Next, the scene switches to a left hand holding a silver needle-like object with a silver-gray strip across its top. A right hand holding a black glue-like substance applies it to the silver-gray strip.
